mapper.select: SELECT * FROM portal_ref WHERE del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} ORDER BY type, sort, update_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO portal_ref( ID, INFO_ID, USER_ID, TENANT_ID, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{portalInfo.id}, #{userId}, #{tenantId}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE portal_ref SET INFO_ID = #{portalInfo.id}, USER_ID = #{userId}, TENANT_ID = #{tenantId}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
